member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.UrlDeliveryNotification
member.summary: URL that will be called when a message is delivered instantly. The submitted TransactionReferenceNumber will added to the URL.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.UrlNonDeliveryNotification
member.summary: URL that will be connected when a message is not delivered. The submitted TransactionReferenceNumber will added to the URL.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.AffiliateId
member.summary: If you are a affiliate partner with ASPSMS you can provide your affiliate-id here.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.ForceGsm7Bit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Force sending GSM7bit characters only to avoid extra cost by acidentally using Unicode Characters [force GSM7 bit].
member.value: true if [force GSM7 bit]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.Originator
member.summary: You can use a phone number or up to 11 Alphabetic characters (e.g. 'MYBUSINESS') as Originator. In order to use a phone number (e.g. '+4176000000') you must unlock it first using the UnlockOriginator method

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.DeferredDeliveryTime
member.summary: By setting the deferred delivery time you can schedule jobs to execute at a specific time. The date time format accepted is ISO8601 UTC YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD (e.g.'2018-08-31T14:00:07+02:00')

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.Options.FlashingSms
member.summary: The message appears directly on the screen of the mobile phone. A flashing message isn't saved directly on the mobile phone. The recipient has to choose to save it. Otherwise the message irrevocably disappears from the screen.

member.name: M:ASPSMSClient.Base.SmsResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.SmsResult.ProviderResponse
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider response.

member.name: P:ASPSMSClient.Base.SmsResult.TrackingId
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracking identifier.

member.name: M:ASPSMSClient.Base.TrackingInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
